attributes.action: Make people who enter the UK illegally ineligible for legal aid
attributes.background: To disincentivise people from entering the country illegally, legal aid should be stopped for anyone who enters the country illegally. It's a complete mockery of the system, especially when legal aid is paid for by the British tax payer
